separator.desc: The string used to separate the breadcrumbs
separator.desc_cn: 用来分开面包屑的字符串

active-color.desc: The color of the active breadcrumb, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc_cn: 激活的面包屑的颜色，可以是Quasar调色板中的任何颜色

gutter.desc: The gutter value allows you control over the space between the breadcrumb elements.
gutter.desc_cn: gutter值允许您控制面包屑元素之间的空间。

separator-color.desc: The color used to color the separator, which can be any color from the Quasar Color Palette
separator-color.desc_cn: 用于给分隔符上色的颜色，可以是Quasar调色板中的任何颜色

align.desc: Specify how to align the breadcrumbs horizontally
align.desc_cn: 指定如何水平对齐面包屑

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽

separator.desc: HTML or component you can slot in to separate the breadcrumbs
